Recollections of Verdi
Fairford, Gloucestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £5 and cup, 2nd £3, 3rd £1. 7th annual contest. 3 bands competed.
Oct. 7, 2013, 7:15 a.m. Oct. 24, 2017, 8:25 a.m.
1 Metropolitan Works (Birmingham) George Henry Wilson
2 Aldbourne Band Fred Dimmock
3 Stinchcombe Band Charles Cooper
